items.sentence: How was I supposed to know that Tom would be late?
We are never as happy or as unhappy as we imagine.
Despite the concerns, the weather was magnificent.
Tom is the only one here who's stronger than I am.
Tom got arrested by a plainclothes police officer.
This is the kind of job you should do all at once.
This is the last time I'll ask you to do anything.
Tom grew up in a small town not too far from here.
Tom didn't mention any reason for why he was late.
Parents will be invited to the school celebration.
